Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan need to register a 287-run win over England if they bat first or chase down any total put up by England by 2.3 overs to qualify for the semis
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between Pakistan and England will be played at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru.
The live streaming of the game between Pakistan and England will be on Disney+ Hotstar.
The odds for this Cricket World Cup 2023 match are available on Dafabet.
Others: The match is scheduled to kickstart at 10:30 IST (+5:30 GMT).
